name: Joana's Adventure
description:
Joana is a newbie music composer with a huge dream. One day, a mysterious man came to Joana's house. Joana will need to fulfill this mysterious man’s request and get a price that will change her life. Will Joana finish this task from the mysterious man? Will Joana be able to be the best composer and make a perfect song? Find out in Joana’s Adventure game.

To play the game: download the zip then unzip, enter the folder and execute game.exe, enjoy!

Controller: use arrow key to move and enter/space to confirm.
